title: D-Link Wireless AC Gaming Router - 1300Mbps, Dual-Band, Gigabit, StreamBoost traffic shaping (DGL-5500)
description: D-Link's Gaming Router (DGL-5500) with Qualcomm Stream Boost traffic shaping technology dynamically manages bandwidth to automatically give all applications the bandwidth they need for the optimal online experience. Cloud-based service keeps your Gaming Router up-to-date as new apps and games are released, ensuring optimal performance. Stream Boost is more than QoS- it's device and app aware traffic shaping that is constantly evolving as new apps and games are released. Designed with Wireless AC1300 and Gigabit ports, all your devices will have lightning fast network throughput and wireless coverage for your whole home. Don't let your games go hungry. Feed the game.
